text: læa cng kl̀āw ẁā “k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ dị̂ thrng pord nả k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hêā tām thāng k̄hêā thī̀ chxbṭhrrm læa dị̂ thrng pord nả k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ xxk tām thāngxxk thī̀ chxbṭhrrm læa thrng pord h̄ı̂ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ mī xảnāc thī̀ k̄hêmk̄hæ̆ng sụ̀ng dị̂ rạb kār ch̀wyh̄elụ̄x cāk phraxngkh̒”
